source.name: tkinterGUI
source.instructions: ## Look at our code, which of the following is TRUE about the `tkinter` GUI ?

answers.answer: The text in a tkinter `ScrolledText` component cannot be right or left justified.
The `.place` function is used to place a component (eg. button, textBox, etc.) on the base GUI component/window.
The size of the base GUI component/window cannot be changed.

source.guidance:
The text in a tkinter `ScrolledText` component can be right or left justified. This can be done by using `.tag_configure('tag-left', justify='left')` on the `ScrolledText` object.

The size of the base GUI component/window can also be changed by using the `.geometry()` function.
